languages.text: "Дом Орселлио... доставил излишние хлопоты Лорд-капитану. Продолжая служить на флагмане фон Валанциус, я искуплю сею досадную ошибку".
"House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."
languages.original_text: "Дом Орселлио... доставил излишние хлопоты Лорд-капитану. Продолжая служить на флагмане фон Валанциус, я искуплю сею досадную ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “奥赛罗家族……给舰长大人带来了不必要的麻烦。我会继续在冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰上服务，以弥补这个令人遗憾的过错。”
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

traits.locale_text: “奥塞罗家族……给舰长大人带来了不必要的麻烦。我会继续在冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰上服务，以弥补这个令人遗憾的过错。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « La maison Orsellio... a en effet été une grande source d'ennuis pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. Je continuerai à servir sur le vaisseau amiral von Valancius tant que cette faute n'aura pas été rachetée. »
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Orsellio... a en effet été une grande source d'ennuis pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. Je continuerai à servir sur le vaisseau amiral von Valancius tant que cette faute n'aura pas été rachetée. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «La casa Orsellio... ha causado problemas innecesarios para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Al seguir sirviendo en la nave insignia de los von Valancius, enmendaré este lamentable error».
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Orsellio... ha causado problemas innecesarios para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Al seguir sirviendo en la nave insignia de los von Valancius, enmendaré este lamentable error».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家は…ロード・キャプテンに余計な手間をかけさせました。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦に仕え続けることで、この度の取り返しのつかない過ちを償わせてください」
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家は…ロード・キャプテンに余計な手間をかけさせました。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦に仕え続けることで、この度の取り返しのつかない過ちを償わせてください」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Haus Orsellio ... hat dem Lord Captain unnötigen Ärger bereitet. Indem ich dem Valancius-Flaggschiff weiter diene, tue ich Buße für diesen bedauernswerten Fehler."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Orsellio ... hat dem Lord Captain unnötigen Ärger bereitet. Indem ich dem Valancius-Flaggschiff weiter diene, tue ich Buße für diesen bedauernswerten Fehler."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi... Durduk yere Lord Kaptan'a sorun çıkardı. Von Valancius sancak gemisinden görevimi sürdürerek bu üzücü hatayı telafi edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio... has caused unnecessary trouble for the Lord Captain. By continuing to serve on the von Valancius flagship, I will atone for this regrettable error."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi... Durduk yere Lord Kaptan'a sorun çıkardı. Von Valancius sancak gemisinden görevimi sürdürerek bu üzücü hatayı telafi edeceğim."
